panels.description: Index Scan value must be higher than sequential scan. Otherwise check table statistics and queries uses that table. If require make some performance tuning on the relevant queries.
panels.title: Sequential/Index Scan

panels.description:
This panel gets values when the vacuum process is active.  Otherwise, this panel shows nothing.

Please DO NOT CHANGE TIME SHIFT!
panels.title: Vacuum Detail

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
list.label: server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "all_table_statistics" WITH KEY=datname where host=~/$server/
list.label: database
list.name: database
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "all_table_statistics" WITH KEY=datname where host=~/$server/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "all_table_statistics" WITH KEY=table_name where host=~/$server/ and datname=~/$database/
list.label: table
list.name: table
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "all_table_statistics" WITH KEY=table_name where host=~/$server/ and datname=~/$database/
